links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, x=n^2; r=0; while (x>0, d=x-10*(x\10); x\=10; r=r*10 + d); write("b061226.txt", n, " ", n^2 + r) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 19 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 22 2001
extensions: More terms from _Patrick De Geest_, May 29 2001
